name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Gmail - On This Day, That Year

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Look back at your Gmail memories!  A Gmail version of Facebook's "On This Day" feature. Relive your emails on this day from pastâ€¦

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Look back at your Gmail memories!  A Gmail version of Facebook's "On This Day" feature. Relive your emails on this day from past years.

With this extension, you can view all the emails you received and sent on this day sorted neatly by categories like Personal, Social etc. including Chats, Notes and Drafts.

Get ready for some Gmail nostalgia!

You can also view emails from another day and relive all the emails you received and sent on that day in the past years.

Note: This extension has read-only access to your emails; it cannot create, send, modify or delete your emails. This extension makes no external network calls so your emails are safe and will never leave your system. This is an open-source extension and the source code is available in Github.


Gmail is a trademark of Google Inc. Use of this trademark is subject to Google Permissions.
